title: Prof.OAK
description:
"Welcome to the first part of the Training sessions. 
 Here, I will explain you how to win a battle of PokeTile."

title: Prof.OAK
description: "And it’s very simple, all you need is having more tile than your opponent on the board."

title: Prof.OAK
description: "Your poketiles are bordered with a blue shadow and your opponent with a red one. So you can easily know which are yours."

title: Prof.OAK
description: "To be more easier, the number of your poketiles, on the board, is represented below your poketiles hand, in your character banner."

title: Prof.OAK
description: "To play a poketile, just drag it from your hand and drop it on the board."

title: Prof.OAK
description: "That's it! It’s better for you test it directly on the board. You can now start this session."
